name: part_015
file: tmp_hololive English 1st Concert -Connect the World- Supported By BUSHIROAD [Free Preview] [-2H-WjJBWsA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: All hololive English members perform the song 'Shiny Smily Story'.
MC section with Takanashi Kiara and Mori Calliope interacting with the audience.

subtitles.original: 笑顔　私
subtitles.english: Smiles, and me

subtitles.original: 憧れの舞台立ちたい
subtitles.english: I want to stand on the stage of my dreams

subtitles.original: 自分らしく輝きたい
subtitles.english: I want to shine in my own way

subtitles.original: 時に涙して　また笑い合いたい
subtitles.english: Sometimes I'll cry, but I want to laugh together again

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: 踏み出そう　奇跡の一歩を
subtitles.english: Let's take that miraculous first step

subtitles.original: いきいきと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams with vitality

subtitles.original: わくわく止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像超えてく　世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that exceeds your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセルふんでみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try stepping on the gas

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてここにはない
subtitles.english: There are no regrets here

subtitles.original: 空超えて誓った心で
subtitles.english: With a heart that made a vow across the sky

subtitles.original: 作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's build it

subtitles.original: Kikkeriki! Hello everyone!
subtitles.english: Kikkeriki! Hello everyone!

subtitles.original: Hey, hey, hey! What's up everyone, what's up Los Angeles!
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey! What's up everyone, what's up Los Angeles!

subtitles.original: We're finally here, Kiara.
subtitles.english: We're finally here, Kiara.

subtitles.original: Yes! Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes!

subtitles.original: Hug me, sister!
subtitles.english: Hug me, sister!

subtitles.original: Alright!
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: Isn't it amazing?
subtitles.english: Isn't it amazing?

subtitles.original: It's amazing! It's beautiful! So cool!
subtitles.english: It's amazing! It's beautiful! So cool!

subtitles.original: Everybody, calm down, calm down.
subtitles.english: Everybody, calm down, calm down.

subtitles.original: Chill, chill, chill.
subtitles.english: Chill, chill, chill.

subtitles.original: Hololive English First Concert Ever...
subtitles.english: Hololive English First Concert Ever...

subtitles.original: ...'Connect the World' has finally begun!
subtitles.english: ...'Connect the World' has finally begun!

subtitles.original: It's begun everybody!
subtitles.english: It's begun everybody!

subtitles.original: Let me hear you cheer! Come on, let me hear your voices!
subtitles.english: Let me hear you cheer! Come on, let me hear your voices!

subtitles.original: How you doing, how you doing?
subtitles.english: How you doing, how you doing?

subtitles.original: The first MC part, the first MC is us...
subtitles.english: The first MC part, the first MC is us...

subtitles.original: ...Takanashi Kiara, Mori Calliope, from Myth! Hello!
subtitles.english: ...Takanashi Kiara, Mori Calliope, from Myth! Hello!

subtitles.original: Hey guys! Thank you, thank you!
subtitles.english: Hey guys! Thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: So the first song was the fan favorite...
subtitles.english: So the first song was the fan favorite...

subtitles.original: ...Shiny Smily Story!
subtitles.english: ...Shiny Smily Story!

subtitles.original: SSS! SSS! SSS! SSS!
subtitles.english: SSS! SSS! SSS! SSS!

subtitles.original: Alright, calm down, Kiara. Chill, chill.
subtitles.english: Alright, calm down, Kiara. Chill, chill.

subtitles.original: Sorry, sorry, I'm excited!
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, I'm excited!

subtitles.original: She's excited! We started off with a banger though, right everyone?
subtitles.english: She's excited! We started off with a banger though, right everyone?

subtitles.original: そうですね！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: Chill, chill, chill. Everyone's really hyped today. I'm happy.
subtitles.english: Chill, chill, chill. Everyone's really hyped today. I'm happy.

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah! Well, this is also the first time...
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah! Well, this is also the first time...

subtitles.original: ...we've ever had so many Hololive English fans...
subtitles.english: ...we've ever had so many Hololive English fans...

subtitles.original: ...here together in one place.
subtitles.english: ...here together in one place.

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah. And also on the stream, too, yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. And also on the stream, too, yeah!

subtitles.original: Are you guys watching? Stream camera doko?
subtitles.english: Are you guys watching? Where is the stream camera?

subtitles.original: Very nice. Alright, I already asked them to do this before...
subtitles.english: Very nice. Alright, I already asked them to do this before...

subtitles.original: ...but I want them to do it again.
subtitles.english: ...but I want them to do it again.

subtitles.original: Everyone at the venue, raise your voice, shout as hard as you can!
subtitles.english: Everyone at the venue, raise your voice, shout as hard as you can!

subtitles.original: Second floor, second floor!
subtitles.english: Second floor, second floor!

subtitles.original: I want to hear second floor! Third floor!
subtitles.english: I want to hear second floor! Third floor!

subtitles.original: First floor! Go, first floor! Come on, use your voice!
subtitles.english: First floor! Go, first floor! Come on, use your voice!

subtitles.original: So loud, so loud! Wow! Thank you!
subtitles.english: So loud, so loud! Wow! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think that that is sufficient. Alright, chill, chill, chill.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think that that is sufficient. Alright, chill, chill, chill.

subtitles.original: Oh but can I do one more thing?
subtitles.english: Oh but can I do one more thing?

subtitles.original: What? What do you want to do?
subtitles.english: What? What do you want to do?

subtitles.original: I always do this like everywhere. You guys know what I want to do.
subtitles.english: I always do this like everywhere. You guys know what I want to do.

subtitles.original: Do you guys know what I want to do?
subtitles.english: Do you guys know what I want to do?

subtitles.original: Oh God, I know what she wants to do.
subtitles.english: Oh God, I know what she wants to do.

subtitles.original: Yes! I want to do the wave! Can we do the wave?
subtitles.english: Yes! I want to do the wave! Can we do the wave?

subtitles.original: Don't you think we already hyped them up enough?
subtitles.english: Don't you think we already hyped them up enough?

subtitles.original: No! This is exciting! Gotta use our time! Gotta do the wave!
subtitles.english: No! This is exciting! Gotta use our time! Gotta do the wave!

subtitles.original: I don't know why I asked. Alright, fine, let's do it. Come here, come here.
subtitles.english: I don't know why I asked. Alright, fine, let's do it. Come here, come here.

subtitles.original: Let's do it! Okay, get ready! I'll go over here...
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Okay, get ready! I'll go over here...

subtitles.original: ...and when we reach your point, you raise your arms!
subtitles.english: ...and when we reach your point, you raise your arms!

subtitles.original: You can even stand up if you want! Yeah!
subtitles.english: You can even stand up if you want! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Okay, are you ready? Here we go! Get ready!
subtitles.english: Okay, are you ready? Here we go! Get ready!

subtitles.original: Three, two, one, come on!
subtitles.english: Three, two, one, come on!

subtitles.original: Raise 'em up, raise 'em up! Let's go, let's go!
subtitles.english: Raise 'em up, raise 'em up! Let's go, let's go!

subtitles.original: Keep it going, keep it going! Very nice!
subtitles.english: Keep it going, keep it going! Very nice!

subtitles.original: And back! Oh God, we're bringing it back!
subtitles.english: And back! Oh God, we're bringing it back!

subtitles.original: Go, go, go! We'll bring it back!
subtitles.english: Go, go, go! We'll bring it back!

subtitles.original: Bring it back, bring it back! Motto motto!
subtitles.english: Bring it back, bring it back! More, more!

subtitles.original: Keep it going, keep it going!
subtitles.english: Keep it going, keep it going!

subtitles.original: Wonderful, wonderful! Okay, no more, no more wave!
subtitles.english: Wonderful, wonderful! Okay, no more, no more wave!

subtitles.original: Applause! It's done, it's done.
subtitles.english: Applause! It's done, it's done.

subtitles.original: Thank you! Thanks guys!
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thanks guys!

subtitles.original: I think that they're sufficiently hyped up.
subtitles.english: I think that they're sufficiently hyped up.

subtitles.original: Everybody's real excited, yeah. Don't answer that...
subtitles.english: Everybody's real excited, yeah. Don't answer that...

subtitles.original: ...you don't need to scream anymore.
subtitles.english: ...you don't need to scream anymore.

subtitles.original: You don't, you don't. You're gonna lose your voices...
subtitles.english: You don't, you don't. You're gonna lose your voices...

subtitles.original: ...by the end of the concert.
subtitles.english: ...by the end of the concert.

subtitles.original: You're right. We should refrain from hyping them up anymore.
subtitles.english: You're right. We should refrain from hyping them up anymore.

subtitles.original: Well, yeah. So we're gonna kick off the solo songs actually from now on.
subtitles.english: Well, yeah. So we're gonna kick off the solo songs actually from now on.

subtitles.original: Gonna hear a lot of EN members' solos.
subtitles.english: Gonna hear a lot of EN members' solos.

subtitles.original: And we'll give it our best, so please cheer for us!
subtitles.english: And we'll give it our best, so please cheer for us!

subtitles.original: Alright, very nice. Thank you. And...
subtitles.english: Alright, very nice. Thank you. And...
